title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the AIPet project, including hardware components, software modules, and communication interfaces.

title: Develop AI and Machine Learning Models
description: Research, design, and develop the AI and machine learning models required for realistic pet behavior and interactions.

title: Design and Build Hardware Components
description: Design and build the physical hardware components for the AIPet, including the robotic body, sensors, and actuators.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Develop the software components required for the AIPet project, including control systems, user interfaces, and integration with AI models.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Set up the development and testing environment for the AIPet project, including hardware and software tools, simulators, and testing frameworks.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement security and privacy measures for the AIPet project, including data encryption, access controls, and compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing and Quality Assurance Plan for AIPet Project
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan for the AIPet project. The plan should cover unit testing, integration testing, system testing, user acceptance testing, and performance testing. Break down each test type into manageable subtasks (e.g., create a separate subtask for each major functionality to be tested). For each subtask, provide clear test cases, expected outcomes, and a timeline. The plan should address both functional (e.g., functionality, usability) and non-functional aspects of the project (e.g., security, scalability, reliability). Collaborate with relevant team members to ensure comprehensive coverage and consistency in testing methodologies. Once completed, submit the testing plan for review and approval by the Project Manager. Upon approval, begin execution of the test plan. To improve clarity, it is suggested to break down each test type into more specific subtasks (e.g., separate subtasks for unit tests on robot movement, unit tests on AI functionality, etc.). This will help in better understanding and tracking of tasks.

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AIPet project, including installation instructions, user manuals, and technical documentation.

title: Plan and Execute Product Launch
description: Plan and execute the product launch for the AIPet project, including marketing, sales, and distribution strategies.
dependencies: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
